name: Evil Wizard (awxy)
description:
This is a 2.5D action game where the player is set to battle an evil wizard endlessly.

After defeating the enemy find the doorway and hit the chest to respawn another enemy. When the enemy respawn, he will gain 20 more to his max health and the player will be healed by 25% of the max health

  • CONTROLS
  • A/D to move sideways 
  • S to crouch
  • Spacebar to jump
  • F to attack
  • W to enter door
by rvros

by LuizMelo

Effects by NYKNCK and pimen

Interior by Exuin and Szadi art.

3D models by GlassOfCoins
